document_title: What is immunodeficiency syndrome? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content:
Based on the body's immunodeficiency status, the doctor will have appropriate treatment methods. Treatment is usually to prevent infection, treat infection, and enhance and improve the function of organs in the immune system. (4)
Doctors may use antibiotics, antiviral drugs such as oseltamivir, acyclovir, interferon and immunoglobulin therapy to treat immune deficiency disorders.
In cases where the bone marrow does not produce enough lymphocytes, the doctor may request a bone marrow transplant to treat the disease.
Based on the cause of the weakened immune system, the doctor will have appropriate treatment methods
